title: Profile problem
body: Ever since I downloaded the patch ive been having problems viewing my and other peoples profiles. This is really annoying and i would like some help

replies.body: I'm having the same problem. After checking about 3 or so profiles from the recently played list or friend list the function just stops entirely. No slow load times. It simply does nothing when clicking both view profile and the "home" profile button. Just completely unresponsive. Everything else still seems to work okay. But it is annoying to have to relog everytiome just to fix it for another 3 profile views.
Can you give me a bit more detail? Do you experience really long loading times, issues displaying specific content on profiles, or crashes when trying to view them? Something different entirely?
